wikipedia_page.main: William McMillan (1876 – February 1958) was a Scottish professional footballer who made 178 appearances in the Football League playing for Lincoln City between 1898 and 1906. He played as a right back or centre half. He also played non-league football for clubs including Newark Town, Castleford Town and Boston Town.
